https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wBrgatzJx1BtSzTwCGFIyIPWTrT.jpg 3 Minutes in America is an experimental narrative criss-crossing the continental US. The film presents a romance unfolding amid an array of contemporary phenomena including vaccine production, basketball games, a fracking well explosion and illicit communications on a government server. 3 Minutes in America
